description.zh-cn: 中国女演员、歌手，毕业于北京电影学院。2004年凭借周星驰电影《功夫》走红，后与杨子合作并结婚。
description.en: A Chinese actress and singer, graduated from the Beijing Film Academy. She rose to fame in 2004 for her role in Stephen Chow's film 'Kung Fu Hustle', and later collaborated with and married Yang Zi.

description.zh-cn: 巨力集团副总裁兼执行总裁，演员，黄圣依的前夫及商业伙伴。
description.en: Vice president and executive president of Juli Group, actor, and the ex-husband and business partner of Huang Shengyi.

description.zh-cn: 香港电影导演及演员，通过电影《功夫》发掘了黄圣依。
description.en: A Hong Kong film director and actor who discovered Huang Shengyi through the movie 'Kung Fu Hustle'.

description.zh-cn: 由周星驰创立的电影公司，曾是黄圣依的经纪公司。
description.en: A film company founded by Stephen Chow, which was formerly Huang Shengyi's management agency.

description.zh-cn: 中国顶尖的电影专业高等院校，黄圣依的母校。
description.en: A top institution of higher education for film studies in China, and Huang Shengyi's alma mater.

description.zh-cn: 由黄圣依和杨子于2008年合伙成立的影视公司。
description.en: A film and television company co-founded by Huang Shengyi and Yang Zi in 2008.

description.zh-cn: 黄圣依于2011年成立的独立子公司，并担任总裁。
description.en: An independent subsidiary company established by Huang Shengyi in 2011, where she serves as president.

description.zh-cn: 中国著名喜剧表演艺术家，黄圣依于2012年拜其为师。
description.en: A renowned Chinese comedy artist whom Huang Shengyi formally acknowledged as her master in 2012.

description.zh-cn: 黄圣依的父亲，曾任上海第二工业大学讲师。
description.en: Huang Shengyi's father, formerly a lecturer at Shanghai Second Polytechnic University.

description.zh-cn: 黄圣依的母亲，《新民晚报》编辑。
description.en: Huang Shengyi's mother, an editor at Xinmin Evening News.

description.zh-cn: 《新民晚报》创始人，黄圣依母亲邓传理的姑妈。
description.en: Founder of Xinmin Evening News and the aunt of Huang Shengyi's mother, Deng Chuanli.

description.zh-cn: 中国经济学家，邓季惺之子，黄圣依母亲的表哥。
description.en: A Chinese economist, son of Deng Jixing, and cousin of Huang Shengyi's mother.

description.zh-cn: 中华人民共和国直辖市，黄圣依的出生地。
description.en: A municipality directly under the Central Government of the People's Republic of China, and the birthplace of Huang Shengyi.

description.zh-cn: 2004年由周星驰执导的电影，黄圣依在片中饰演女主角，并因此一举成名。
description.en: A 2004 film directed by Stephen Chow, in which Huang Shengyi played the female lead and rose to fame.

description.zh-cn: 2007年播出的电视剧，是黄圣依的代表作之一。
description.en: A TV series broadcast in 2007, which is one of Huang Shengyi's representative works.

description.zh-cn: 2007年播出的电视剧，由黄圣依和杨子主演，成为央视八套当年的收视冠军。
description.en: A TV series aired in 2007 starring Huang Shengyi and Yang Zi, which became the ratings champion of CCTV-8 for that year.

en: The Sorcerer and the White Snake

description.zh-cn: 2011年上映的电影，由黄圣依主演，帮助其事业重回正轨。
description.en: A film released in 2011 starring Huang Shengyi, which helped get her career back on track.

description.zh-cn: 中国大陆对特定时期四位新生代女演员的称呼。2009年，黄圣依与刘亦菲、杨幂、王珞丹一同获此称号。
description.en: A title given to four promising young actresses of a certain period in mainland China. In 2009, Huang Shengyi, along with Liu Yifei, Yang Mi, and Wang Luodan, was given this title.

description.zh-cn: 中国女演员，与黄圣依等人同被评为2009年“四小花旦”。
description.en: A Chinese actress, named as one of the 'Four Dan Actresses' of 2009 along with Huang Shengyi and others.

description.zh-cn: 中国女演员，与黄圣依等人同被评为2009年“四小花旦”。
description.en: A Chinese actress, named as one of the 'Four Dan Actresses' of 2009 along with Huang Shengyi and others.

description.zh-cn: 中国女演员，与黄圣依等人同被评为2009年“四小花旦”。
description.en: A Chinese actress, named as one of the 'Four Dan Actresses' of 2009 along with Huang Shengyi and others.

description.zh-cn: 中国大型互联网公司，2009年发起“80后新生代娱乐大明星”评选。
description.en: A major Chinese internet company that launched the 'Post-80s New Generation Entertainment Superstars' poll in 2009.

description.zh-cn: 由黄圣依、杨子及苏雷洋于2007年成立的影视公司。
description.en: A film and television company established in 2007 by Huang Shengyi, Yang Zi, and Su Leiyang.

description.zh-cn: 黄圣依于2006年签约的唱片公司。
description.en: The record label that Huang Shengyi signed with in 2006.

description.zh-cn: 香港大型娱乐公司，黄圣依于2008年加盟。
description.en: A major Hong Kong entertainment company that Huang Shengyi joined in 2008.

description.zh-cn: 英皇娱乐集团旗下负责中国大陆艺人管理的子公司，黄圣依于2007年签约。
description.en: A subsidiary of Emperor Entertainment Group responsible for artist management in mainland China, which Huang Shengyi signed with in 2007.

description.zh-cn: 杨子的前妻，毕业于复旦大学。
description.en: Yang Zi's ex-wife, a graduate of Fudan University.

description.zh-cn: 位于上海的著名高等学府，陶虹的母校。
description.en: A renowned institution of higher learning in Shanghai, and Tao Hong's alma mater.

description.zh-cn: 杨子家族的企业，杨子在其中担任副总裁兼执行总裁。
description.en: The family business of Yang Zi, where he serves as vice president and executive president.

description.zh-cn: 位于上海的高等院校，黄圣依的父亲黄自强曾在此任教。
description.en: An institution of higher education in Shanghai where Huang Shengyi's father, Huang Ziqiang, once taught.

description.zh-cn: 上海的报纸，由黄圣依的姑婆邓季惺创办，其母亲邓传理在此担任编辑。
description.en: A Shanghai newspaper founded by Huang Shengyi's grandaunt Deng Jixing, where her mother Deng Chuanli worked as an editor.

description.zh-cn: 2003年的严重急性呼吸系统综合症疫情。该事件导致黄圣依返回上海，并因此获得了参演《功夫》的机会。
description.en: The 2003 Severe Acute Respiratory Syndrome outbreak. The event led to Huang Shengyi returning to Shanghai, which provided her with the opportunity to audition for 'Kung Fu Hustle'.

description.zh-cn: 黄圣依与杨子于2007年结婚，并于2025年证实离婚。
description.en: Huang Shengyi married Yang Zi in 2007 and their divorce was confirmed in 2025.

description.zh-cn: 杨子与前妻陶虹于2004年离婚。
description.en: Yang Zi divorced his ex-wife Tao Hong in 2004.

description.zh-cn: 邓季惺是邓传理的姑妈。
description.en: Deng Jixing is Deng Chuanli's aunt.

description.zh-cn: 吴敬琏是邓传理的表哥。
description.en: Wu Jinglian is Deng Chuanli's male cousin.

description.zh-cn: 周星驰在电影《功夫》中启用黄圣依为女主角，使其一举成名。
description.en: Stephen Chow cast Huang Shengyi as the female lead in 'Kung Fu Hustle', which catapulted her to fame.

description.zh-cn: 黄圣依因出演《功夫》签约星辉公司，后于2005年开始解约官司，2007年正式解约。
description.en: Huang Shengyi signed with Star Overseas after starring in 'Kung Fu Hustle', started legal proceedings to terminate the contract in 2005, and officially left in 2007.

description.zh-cn: 因私下为《男人装》杂志拍摄性感封面，黄圣依遭公司雪藏，随后她单方面宣布解约，双方矛盾激化并对簿公堂。
description.en: After she posed for a sexy photoshoot for 'For Him Magazine' without permission, the company shelved her. She then unilaterally announced the termination of her contract, leading to an escalated conflict and lawsuits.

description.zh-cn: 在与黄圣依发生合约纠纷后，星辉公司对其采取了封杀措施。
description.en: After the contract dispute with Huang Shengyi arose, Star Overseas Ltd. took measures to blacklist her.

description.zh-cn: 参演《功夫》使黄圣依一炮而红，成为万众瞩目的“星女郎”。
description.en: Starring in 'Kung Fu Hustle' made Huang Shengyi an instant star, becoming a famous 'Sing Girl'.

description.zh-cn: 在黄圣依与星辉公司解约期间，杨子为其提供支持和策划，并在之后与其展开全面商业合作。
description.en: During Huang Shengyi's contract dispute with Star Overseas, Yang Zi provided support and strategy, and later launched a full-scale business partnership with her.

description.zh-cn: 巨力圣依是黄圣依成立的、隶属于巨力影视的独立子公司。
description.en: Juli Shengyi is an independent subsidiary of Juli Film, established by Huang Shengyi.

description.zh-cn: 黄圣依拜赵本山为师。
description.en: Huang Shengyi became an apprentice to Zhao Benshan.

description.zh-cn: 腾讯网于2009年4月发起“80后新生代娱乐大明星”评选，评选出新“四小花旦”。
description.en: In April 2009, Tencent launched a poll for 'Post-80s New Generation Entertainment Superstars', which selected the new 'Four Dan Actresses'.

description.zh-cn: 因2003年非典疫情，黄圣依从北京回到上海，从而偶然获得了参加《功夫》演员甄选的机会。
description.en: Due to the 2003 SARS outbreak, Huang Shengyi returned to Shanghai from Beijing, which led to her serendipitous opportunity to audition for 'Kung Fu Hustle'.
